result.execSummary:
This case has not been concluded. Unless a judgment of conviction is entered, the defendant is presumed innocent of all charges.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.
result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Amanda C Bjorkman

defendant.name: Bjorkman, Amanda C
defendant.address: N20590 County Road O, Niagara, WI 54151

records.addlTxt: 12:04 PM Defendant Amanda C Bjorkman in court with attorney Breanna A. Halyburton - who appears via video Zoom.  Alexander Paul Seifert appeared for the State of Wisconsin. Court makes sure parties are aware of the Amended Complaint. Parties are aware of it (changed place/location of crime). State calls Detective Connor Johnson. Johnson sworn in at 12:05 PM. Direct exam by State. Record reflects proper identification of the defendant (12:11 PM). No cross by Halyburton. Johnson excused at 12:11 PM. Court finds probable cause, binds over for trial. State has not filed an Information yet. Court asks Halyburton what she prefers today. Halyburton will proceed with the understanding that the Information willl mirror the complaint, proceeds to ARGN, enters NG pleas. Court accepts plea, directs State to file Information forthwith, continues bond, set for JT.

records.descr: Waiver of time limits for preliminary hearing

records.addlTxt: Preliminary hearing on March 30, 2022 at 11:45 am.

10:10 AM Defendant Amanda C Bjorkman in court with attorney Breanna A. Halyburton.  Alexander Paul Seifert appeared for the State of Wisconsin. Bjorkman and Halyburton have complaint, waives reading of it, requests PH within time limits. Court continues bond, sets for PH on 3/30/22 at 11:45 AM.

records.descr: Demand for Discovery and Inspection - Defendant

records.addlTxt: Notify COC of any change of address within 48 hours,
Adjourned initial appearance on March 23, 2022 at 10:30 am.

10:14 AM Defendant Amanda C Bjorkman in court, in custody.  Alexander Paul Seifert appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Amanda C Bjorkman appeared by video means from FOSO. State - here on return on warrant. Court reviews file, defendant did not appear on 2/7/22. Bjorkman does not have complaint. State will send one to FOSO. Court reads charges and penalties and right to attorney and court appointed attorney, Court confused on charge, may be a typographical error. State will amend complaint. Bjorkman understands charges and penalties, has contacted SPD and are eligible and they are looking for an attorney for her. Court sets for AIA on 3/23/22 at 3/23/22 at 10:30 AM. State - bond - $1500.00 cash bond. Court asks defendant if she can afford that bond, asks what her address is. Bjorkman responds, has been evicted from her home, looking to relocate to Wausau area and seek treatment for some issues that she has, does not currently work. State provides criminal history, defendant does have Attorney Patty Wabitsch on her Florence County case, will now ask for a $3,000.00 signature bond. Court - bond - $2,000.00 signature bond - notify COC of any change of address within 48 hours, sets for AIA on 3/23/22 at 10;30 AM, instructed to contact SPD frequently, confirms address.

Return on warrant/Initial appearance on February 16, 2022 at 10:15 am.

11:17 AM Defendant Amanda C Bjorkman not in court.  Alexander Paul Seifert appeared for the State of Wisconsin appears by video. CC and CR appear by video. State based on failure to appear, bond form did indicate court hearing was noted on bond that she signed, request forfeiture of bond and asks for warrant body or $2000, returnable nationwide. Court based on statement of DA, forfeites bond posted and issues warrant body or $2000, returnable nationwide.
